Class RtfContainer

Direct Known Subclasses:
RtfAfter, RtfBefore, RtfBookmarkContainerImpl, RtfDocumentArea, RtfExtraRowSet, RtfFile, RtfFootnote, RtfHyperLink, RtfJforCmd, RtfLeader, RtfList, RtfListItem, RtfListTable, RtfNull, RtfPage, RtfPageArea, RtfPageNumber, RtfPageNumberCitation, RtfParagraphKeepTogether, RtfSection, RtfTable, RtfTableCell, RtfTableRow, RtfTextrun
public class RtfContainer
extends RtfElement

An RtfElement that can contain other elements.

This work was authored by Bertrand Delacretaz (bdelacretaz@codeconsult.ch).

isEmpty

public boolean isEmpty()
Specified by:
isEmpty in class RtfElement
Returns:
